Deerfield_Beach.Digital Media Arts College:
Digital Media Arts College (DMAC) is an art and design college in Boca Raton, Florida. DMAC was founded in 2002 to offer bachelor's degrees in 3D animation and graphic design.
DMAC was accredited nationally by the Accrediting Council for Independent Colleges and Schools (ACICS), which is no longer recognized by the Department of Education since December 12, 2016.
